jdbcService.sql: update component_anchor set db_modified_utc = timezone ('UTC', current_timestamp), name = case when :name is null then name else :name end, display_name = case when :displayName is null then display_name else :displayName end, main = case when :main is null then main else :main end, component_template_id = case when :componentTemplateId is null then component_template_id else :componentTemplateId end where id = :id
